data.label: 智能小程序
data.description: 智能小程序，是百度提供的一种技术解决方案。开发者基于此开发出来的服务，在各类宿主环境（手机 App、车载系统、IOT 设备等）中，可做到用户无感知安装，即点即用。

data.label: 智能小程序
data.description: Smart Mini Program is a technical solution provided by Baidu. Services developed based on this can be used in various host environments (mobile apps, in-vehicle systems, IoT devices, etc.) without users perceiving installation, enabling instant use.
